thread.title: HAYSTACKID Platinum Sponsor of the Federal Bar Association's Annual Meeting in Salt Lake City and Speaking on Discovery Issues Panel
thread.title_full: HAYSTACKID Platinum Sponsor of the Federal Bar Association's Annual Meeting in Salt Lake City and Speaking on Discovery Issues Panel

author: admin
title: HAYSTACKID Platinum Sponsor of the Federal Bar Association's Annual Meeting in Salt Lake City and Speaking on Discovery Issues Panel
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/3/2015 @ 9:51 AM Companies mentioned in this article: HAYSTACKID 
BOSTON, Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- HAYSTACKID, an international eDiscovery and digital forensics solutions provider, announced today that it will be a top sponsor for the third year running of the Federal Bar Association's 2015 Annual Meeting & Convention. The Federal Bar Association ("FBA") annual meeting is taking place this year September 10th through the 12th in Salt Lake City, UT. There will be various informational sessions and discussions that relate to a wide breadth of current and emerging trends in the legal sector during this year's annual meeting. In addition to the Younger Lawyer Luncheon, which HAYSTACKID is known for its sponsorship, they will also be a featured keynote speaker at this event. Jason Glass, Executive Vice President, HAYSTACKID, will be moderating the session titled "ZEALOUS ADVOCACY AND COOPERATION: NOT MUTUALLY EXCLUSIVE CONCEPTS IN DISCOVERY" where industry renowned General Counsel, Magistrate Judge, and eDiscovery Counsel will participate. The session is focused around one of Mr. Glass' areas of expertise - Rule 1, which counsels the bench and bar to pursue the "just, speedy, and inexpensive determination of every action." The panel will discuss this rule and how it is stretched to its breaking point when counsel becomes embroiled in discovery disputes that should have been avoided, or otherwise when counsel does not handle eDiscovery in a collaborative way. 
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150903/263502LOGO 
"I look forward to a lively discussion on this all important and very hot topic," said Jason Glass from the company's Boston, MA corporate headquarters. "We have a terrific group of well renowned industry leaders and these discussion points are generating more and more buzz and interest. We are expecting a very well attended session with a strong balance of opinions from all the prospectives at play in these disputes." 
About the Federal Bar Association 
The Federal Bar Association ("FBA"), founded in 1920, is dedicated to the advancement of the science of jurisprudence and to promoting the welfare, interests, education, and professional development of all attorneys involved in federal law. Our members run the gamut of federal practice: attorneys practicing in small to large legal firms, attorneys in corporations and federal agencies, and members of the judiciary. The FBA is the catalyst for communication between the bar and the bench, as well as the private and public sectors. The FBA supports its members with advocacy, networking, leadership and learning, leveraging events such as this annual conference to strengthen communication between the bar and the bench. 
About HAYSTACKID 
HAYSTACKID is an international eDiscovery and digital forensics solutions provider, with office locations throughout the country and in Europe. HAYSTACKID provides corporate customers and their counsel with cost predictability options that allow accurate budgeting and forecasting of their discovery expenses without the additional cost of software, hardware or implementation fees. HAYSTACKID is headquartered in Boston with offices in New York, Washington, D.C., Chicago, Dallas, Houston, Los Angeles, San Diego, San Francisco, Beaverton and Paris, France. HAYSTACKID was recently named one of the fastest growing companies in the nation ranking #67 overall on the 34th annual Inc. 5000 of the nation's fastest-growing private companies. 
Contact: media@haystackid.com 877.9.HAYSTACK (877.942.9782)
